loginCta.title: Log in to unlock more features!
loginCta.message: Log in to use Pay Later, view your order history, and earn points! Currently only available to BAID students and faculty.

updateCta.title: What's New
updateCta.point1: Welcome back! Whale Cafe has been upgraded for the new semester.
updateCta.point2: Whale Cafe now comes with a better, more user-friendly experience.
updateCta.point3: We now support Weixin Pay! You no longer have to wait for your payment to be confirmed.
updateCta.point4: You can still pay with cash, coupons, or Pay Later.
